[32mffavin[0m

Description: FFMPEG AV Capture
Version: Lavd57.10.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

Reads from audio/video capture devices using FFMPEG.
See FFMPEG documentation (https://ffmpeg.org/documentation.html) for more details.
To list all supported grabbers for your GPAC build, use [33m[3mgpac -h ffavin:*[0m.


[32mDevice identification[0m

Typical classes are [33m[3mdshow[0m on windows, [33m[3mavfoundation[0m on OSX, [33m[3mvideo4linux2[0m or [33m[3mx11grab[0m on linux

Typical device name can be the webcam name:
- [33m[3mFaceTime HD Camera[0m on OSX, device name on windows, [33m[3m/dev/video0[0m on linux
- [33m[3mscreen-capture-recorder[0m, see http://screencapturer.sf.net/ on windows
- [33m[3mCapture screen 0[0m on OSX (0=first screen), or [33m[3mscreenN[0m for short
- X display name (eg [33m[3m:0.0[0m) on linux

The general mapping from ffmpeg command line is:
- ffmpeg [33m[3m-f[0m maps to [33m[3mfmt[0m option
- ffmpeg [33m[3m-i[0m maps to [33m[3mdev[0m option

[33mExample:
ffmpeg -f libndi_newtek -i MY_NDI_TEST ...[0m
[33mgpac -i av://:fmt=libndi_newtek:dev=MY_NDI_TEST ...[0m




[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msrc[0m (str):                     url of device, [33m[3mvideo://[0m, [33m[3maudio://[0m or [33m[3mav://[0m
[32mfmt[0m (str):                     name of device class - see filter help. If not set, defaults to first device class
[32mdev[0m (str, default: [3m0[0m):         name of device or index of device - see filter help
[32mavioflags[0m (uint):               
	* [33mdirect[0m: reduce buffering
[32mprobesize[0m (lsint, default: [3m5000000[0m, minmax: 32-I): set probing size
[32mformatprobesize[0m (sint, default: [3m1048576[0m, minmax: 0-2147483646): number of bytes to probe file format
[32mfflags[0m (uint):                  
	* [33mignidx[0m: ignore index
	* [33mgenpts[0m: generate pts
	* [33mnofillin[0m: do not fill in missing values that can be exactly calculated
	* [33mnoparse[0m: disable AVParsers, this needs nofillin too
	* [33migndts[0m: ignore dts
	* [33mdiscardcorrupt[0m: discard corrupted frames
	* [33msortdts[0m: try to interleave outputted packets by dts
	* [33mkeepside[0m: don't merge side data
	* [33mfastseek[0m: fast but inaccurate seeks
	* [33mnobuffer[0m: reduce the latency introduced by optional buffering
[32mseek2any[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): allow seeking to non-keyframes on demuxer level when supported
[32manalyzeduration[0m (lsint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): specify how many microseconds are analyzed to probe the input
[32mcryptokey[0m (uint):              decryption key
[32mindexmem[0m (sint, default: [3m1048576[0m, minmax: 0-I): max memory used for timestamp index (per stream)
[32mrtbufsize[0m (sint, default: [3m3041280[0m, minmax: 0-I): max memory used for buffering real-time frames
[32mfdebug[0m (uint):                 print specific debug info
	* [33mts[0m: 
[32mmax_delay[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): maximum muxing or demuxing delay in microseconds
[32mfpsprobesize[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-2147483646): number of frames used to probe fps
[32mf_err_detect[0m (uint):           set error detection flags (deprecated; use err_detect, save via avconv)
	* [33merr_detect[0m: set error detection flags
	* [33mcrccheck[0m: verify embedded CRCs
	* [33mbitstream[0m: detect bitstream specification deviations
	* [33mbuffer[0m: detect improper bitstream length
	* [33mexplode[0m: abort decoding on minor error detection
	* [33mignore_err[0m: ignore errors
	* [33mcareful[0m: consider things that violate the spec, are fast to check and have not been seen in the wild as errors
	* [33mcompliant[0m: consider all spec non compliancies as errors
	* [33maggressive[0m: consider things that a sane encoder shouldn't do as an error
[32muse_wallclock_as_timestamps[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): use wallclock as timestamps
[32mskip_initial_bytes[0m (lsint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): set number of bytes to skip before reading header and frames
[32mcorrect_ts_overflow[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): correct single timestamp overflows
[32mf_strict[0m (sint):               how strictly to follow the standards (deprecated; use strict, save via avconv)
	* [33mstrict[0m: how strictly to follow the standards
	* [33mvery[0m: strictly conform to a older more strict version of the spec or reference software
	* [33mstrict[0m: strictly conform to all the things in the spec no matter what the consequences
	* [33mnormal[0m: 
	* [33munofficial[0m: allow unofficial extensions
	* [33mexperimental[0m: allow non-standardized experimental variants
[32mmax_ts_probe[0m (sint, default: [3m50[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum number of packets to read while waiting for the first timestamp
[32mdump_separator[0m (str, default: [3m, [0m): set information dump field separator
[32mcodec_whitelist[0m (str):         List of decoders that are allowed to be used
[32mformat_whitelist[0m (str):        List of demuxers that are allowed to be used
[32mprotocol_whitelist[0m (str):      List of protocols that are allowed to be used
[32mprotocol_blacklist[0m (str):      List of protocols that are not allowed to be used
[32mmax_streams[0m (sint, default: [3m1000[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum number of streams
[32m*[0m (str):                       any possible options defined for AVInputFormat and AVFormatContext. See [33m[3mgpac -hx ffavin[0m and [33m[3mgpac -hx ffavin:*[0m


[32mffsws[0m

Description: FFMPEG video rescaler
Version: SwS4.8.100

For bicubic, to tune the shape of the basis function, [33m[3mp1[0m tunes f(1) and [33m[3mp2[0m f´(1)
For gauss [33m[3mp1[0m tunes the exponent and thus cutoff frequency
For lanczos [33m[3mp1[0m tunes the width of the window function
See FFMPEG documentation (https://ffmpeg.org/documentation.html) for more details


[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mosize[0m (v2di):                  osize of output video. When not set, input osize is used
[32mofmt[0m (pfmt, default: [3mnone[0m, minmax: none,yuv420,yvu420,yuv420_10,yuv422,yuv422_10,yuv444,yuv444_10,uyvy,vyuy,yuyv,yvyu,uyvl,vyul,yuyl,yvyl,nv12,nv21,nv1l,nv2l,yuva,yuvd,yuv444a,yuv444p,yuv444ap,yuv444p_10,grey,algr,gral,rgb4,rgb5,rgb6,rgba,argb,bgra,abgr,rgb,bgr,xrgb,rgbx,xbgr,bgrx,rgbd,rgbds,rgbs,rgbas): pixel format for output video. When not set, input format is used

[32mffenc:amv[0m

Description: AMV Video
Version: Lavc57.107.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation
[32mpred[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 1-3): Prediction method
 - left
 - plane
 - median
[32mhuffman[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-1): Huffman table strategy
 - default
 - optimal

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mmax_extra_cb_iterations[0m (sint, default: [3m2[0m, minmax: 0-I): Max extra codebook recalculation passes, more is better and slower
[32mskip_empty_cb[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Avoid wasting bytes, ignore vintage MacOS decoder
[32mmax_strips[0m (sint, default: [3m3[0m, minmax: 1-32): Limit strips/frame, vintage compatible is 1..3, otherwise the more the better
[32mmin_strips[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 1-32): Enforce min strips/frame, more is worse and faster, must be <= max_strips
[32mstrip_number_adaptivity[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-31): How fast the strip number adapts, more is slightly better, much slower

[32mffenc:flv[0m

Description: FLV / Sorenson Spark / Sorenson H.263 (Flash Video)
Version: Lavc57.107.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

[32mobmc[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):   use overlapped block motion compensation.
[32mmb_info[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): emit macroblock info for RFC 2190 packetization, the parameter value is the maximum payload size
[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block

	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero

	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences

 - dctmax
 - chroma

Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mumv[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use unlimited motion vectors.
[32maiv[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use alternative inter VLC.
[32mobmc[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):   use overlapped block motion compensation.
[32mstructured_slices[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Write slice start position at every GOB header instead of just GOB number.
[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mgop_timecode[0m (str):            MPEG GOP Timecode in hh:mm:ss[:;.]ff format. Overrides timecode_frame_start.
[32mintra_vlc[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Use MPEG-2 intra VLC table.
[32mdrop_frame_timecode[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Timecode is in drop frame format.
[32mscan_offset[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Reserve space for SVCD scan offset user data.
[32mtimecode_frame_start[0m (lsint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): GOP timecode frame start number, in non-drop-frame format
[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation

When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.

[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)

[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)

 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision

[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

Description: MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 3
Version: Lavc57.107.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold

[32mffenc:rv10[0m

Description: RealVideo 1.0
Version: Lavc57.107.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

[32mffenc:wmv1[0m

Description: Windows Media Video 7
Version: Lavc57.107.100
Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32msad[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Sum of absolute differences, fast
	 * [33msse[0m: Sum of squared errors
	 * [33msatd[0m: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences
	 * [33mdct[0m: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences
	 * [33mpsnr[0m: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality
	 * [33mbit[0m: Number of bits needed for the block
	 * [33mrd[0m: Rate distortion optimal, slow
	 * [33mzero[0m: Zero
	 * [33mvsad[0m: Sum of absolute vertical differences
	 * [33mvsse[0m: Sum of squared vertical differences
	 * [33mnsse[0m: Noise preserving sum of squared differences
 - dct264
 - dctmax
 - chroma
	 * [33mmsad[0m: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted
	 * [33mskip_cmp[0m: Frame skip compare function
[32mmpv_flags[0m (uint, default: [3m0[0m):  Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
	 * [33mskip_rd[0m: RD optimal MB level residual skipping
	 * [33mstrict_gop[0m: Strictly enforce gop size
	 * [33mqp_rd[0m: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection
	 * [33mcbp_rd[0m: use rate distortion optimization for CBP
	 * [33mnaq[0m: normalize adaptive quantization
	 * [33mmv0[0m: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>
[32mluma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mchroma_elim_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
[32mquantizer_noise_shaping[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): (null)
[32merror_rate[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
[32mqsquish[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):     how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
[32mrc_qmod_amp[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_qmod_freq[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): experimental quantizer modulation
[32mrc_eq[0m (str):                   Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
[32mrc_init_cplx[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): initial complexity for 1-pass encoding
[32mrc_buf_aggressivity[0m (flt, default: [3m1[0m): currently useless
[32mborder_mask[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m): increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
[32mlmin[0m (sint, default: [3m236[0m, minmax: 0-I): minimum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mlmax[0m (sint, default: [3m3658[0m, minmax: 0-I): maximum Lagrange factor (VBR)
[32mibias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): intra quant bias
[32mpbias[0m (sint, default: [3m999999[0m, minmax: -I-I): inter quant bias
[32mrc_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): ratecontrol method
	 * [33mffmpeg[0m: default native rate control
	 * [33mxvid[0m: libxvid (2 pass only)
[32mmotion_est[0m (sint, default: [3m1[0m, minmax: 0-2): motion estimation algorithm
 - zero
 - epzs
 - xone
[32mforce_duplicated_matrix[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mb_sensitivity[0m (sint, default: [3m40[0m, minmax: 1-I): Adjust sensitivity of b_frame_strategy 1
[32mbrd_scale[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-3): Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
[32mskip_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip threshold
[32mskip_factor[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip factor
[32mskip_exp[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Frame skip exponent
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mmpeg_quant[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
[32mps[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): RTP payload size in bytes
[32mmepc[0m (sint, default: [3m256[0m, minmax: -I-I): Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256)
[32mmepre[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: -I-I): pre motion estimation

[32mlossless[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Use lossless mode
[32mpreset[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-5): Configuration preset
	 * [33mnone[0m: do not use a preset
	 * [33mdefault[0m: default preset
	 * [33mpicture[0m: digital picture, like portrait, inner shot
	 * [33mphoto[0m: outdoor photograph, with natural lighting
	 * [33mdrawing[0m: hand or line drawing, with high-contrast details
	 * [33micon[0m: small-sized colorful images
	 * [33mtext[0m: text-like

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mpreset[0m (str, default: [3mmedium[0m): Set the encoding preset (cf. x264 --fullhelp)
[32mtune[0m (str):                    Tune the encoding params (cf. x264 --fullhelp)
[32mprofile[0m (str):                 Set profile restrictions (cf. x264 --fullhelp) 
[32mfastfirstpass[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): Use fast settings when encoding first pass
[32mlevel[0m (str):                   Specify level (as defined by Annex A)
[32mpasslogfile[0m (str):             Filename for 2 pass stats
[32mwpredp[0m (str):                  Weighted prediction for P-frames
[32ma53cc[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):   Use A53 Closed Captions (if available)
[32mx264opts[0m (str):                x264 options
[32mcrf[0m (flt, default: [3m-1[0m):        Select the quality for constant quality mode
[32mcrf_max[0m (flt, default: [3m-1[0m):    In CRF mode, prevents VBV from lowering quality beyond this point.
[32mqp[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Constant quantization parameter rate control method
[32maq-mode[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): AQ method
 - none
	 * [33mvariance[0m: Variance AQ (complexity mask)
	 * [33mautovariance[0m: Auto-variance AQ
	 * [33mautovariance-biased[0m: Auto-variance AQ with bias to dark scenes
[32maq-strength[0m (flt, default: [3m-1[0m): AQ strength. Reduces blocking and blurring in flat and textured areas.
[32mpsy[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):     Use psychovisual optimizations.
[32mpsy-rd[0m (str):                  Strength of psychovisual optimization, in <psy-rd>:<psy-trellis> format.
[32mrc-lookahead[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Number of frames to look ahead for frametype and ratecontrol
[32mweightb[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): Weighted prediction for B-frames.
[32mweightp[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Weighted prediction analysis method.
 - none
 - simple
 - smart
[32mssim[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):    Calculate and print SSIM stats.
[32mintra-refresh[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): Use Periodic Intra Refresh instead of IDR frames.
[32mbluray-compat[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): Bluray compatibility workarounds.
[32mb-bias[0m (sint, default: [3m-I[0m, minmax: -I-I): Influences how often B-frames are used
[32mb-pyramid[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Keep some B-frames as references.
 - none
	 * [33mstrict[0m: Strictly hierarchical pyramid
	 * [33mnormal[0m: Non-strict (not Blu-ray compatible)
[32mmixed-refs[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): One reference per partition, as opposed to one reference per macroblock
[32m8x8dct[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):  High profile 8x8 transform.
[32mfast-pskip[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): (null)
[32maud[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):     Use access unit delimiters.
[32mmbtree[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):  Use macroblock tree ratecontrol.
[32mdeblock[0m (str):                 Loop filter parameters, in <alpha:beta> form.
[32mcplxblur[0m (flt, default: [3m-1[0m):   Reduce fluctuations in QP (before curve compression)
[32mpartitions[0m (str):              A comma-separated list of partitions to consider. Possible values: p8x8, p4x4, b8x8, i8x8, i4x4, none, all
[32mdirect-pred[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Direct MV prediction mode
 - none
 - spatial
 - temporal
 - auto
[32mslice-max-size[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Limit the size of each slice in bytes
[32mstats[0m (str):                   Filename for 2 pass stats
[32mnal-hrd[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Signal HRD information (requires vbv-bufsize; cbr not allowed in .mp4)
 - none
 - vbr
 - cbr
[32mavcintra-class[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-200): AVC-Intra class 50/100/200
[32mmotion-est[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-4): Set motion estimation method
 - dia
 - hex
 - umh
 - esa
 - tesa
[32mforced-idr[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.
[32mcoder[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-1): Coder type
 - default
 - cavlc
 - cabac
 - vlc
 - ac
[32mb_strategy[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-2): Strategy to choose between I/P/B-frames
[32mchromaoffset[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -I-I): QP difference between chroma and luma
[32msc_threshold[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -I-I): Scene change threshold
[32mnoise_reduction[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -I-I): Noise reduction
[32mx264-params[0m (str):             Override the x264 configuration using a :-separated list of key=value parameters

[32mpreset[0m (sint, default: [3m2[0m, minmax: 0-11): Set the encoding preset
	 * [33mdefault[0m: 
	 * [33mslow[0m: hq 2 passes
	 * [33mmedium[0m: hq 1 pass
	 * [33mfast[0m: hp 1 pass
	 * [33mhp[0m: 
	 * [33mhq[0m: 
	 * [33mbd[0m:

	 * [33mllhq[0m: low latency hq

	 * [33mmain[0m: 
	 * [33mhigh[0m: 
	 * [33mhigh444p[0m: 
[32mlevel[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-51): Set the encoding level restriction
	 * [33mauto[0m: 
	 * [33m1[0m: 
	 * [33m1.0[0m: 
	 * [33m1b[0m: 
	 * [33m1.0b[0m: 
	 * [33m1.1[0m: 
	 * [33m1.2[0m: 
	 * [33m1.3[0m: 
	 * [33m2[0m: 
	 * [33m2.0[0m: 
	 * [33m2.1[0m: 
	 * [33m2.2[0m: 
	 * [33m3[0m: 
	 * [33m3.0[0m: 
	 * [33m3.1[0m: 
	 * [33m3.2[0m: 
	 * [33m4[0m: 
	 * [33m4.0[0m: 
	 * [33m4.1[0m: 
	 * [33m4.2[0m: 
	 * [33m5[0m: 
	 * [33m5.0[0m: 
	 * [33m5.1[0m: 
[32mrc[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Override the preset rate-control
	 * [33mconstqp[0m: Constant QP mode
	 * [33mvbr[0m: Variable bitrate mode
	 * [33mcbr[0m: Constant bitrate mode
	 * [33mvbr_minqp[0m: Variable bitrate mode with MinQP (deprecated)
	 * [33mll_2pass_quality[0m: Multi-pass optimized for image quality (deprecated)
	 * [33mll_2pass_size[0m: Multi-pass optimized for constant frame size (deprecated)
	 * [33mvbr_2pass[0m: Multi-pass variable bitrate mode (deprecated)
	 * [33mcbr_ld_hq[0m: Constant bitrate low delay high quality mode
	 * [33mcbr_hq[0m: Constant bitrate high quality mode
	 * [33mvbr_hq[0m: Variable bitrate high quality mode
[32mrc-lookahead[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Number of frames to look ahead for rate-control
[32msurfaces[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-64): Number of concurrent surfaces
[32mcbr[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use cbr encoding mode
[32m2pass[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):   Use 2pass encoding mode
[32mgpu[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -2-I): Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on.
	 * [33many[0m: Pick the first device available
	 * [33mlist[0m: List the available devices
[32mdelay[0m (sint, default: [3m+I[0m, minmax: 0-I): Delay frame output by the given amount of frames
[32mno-scenecut[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts
[32mforced-idr[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.
[32mb_adapt[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m): When lookahead is enabled, set this to 0 to disable adaptive B-frame decision
[32mspatial-aq[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ
[32mtemporal-aq[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ
[32mzerolatency[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay)
[32mnonref_p[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames
[32mstrict_gop[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations
[32maq-strength[0m (sint, default: [3m8[0m, minmax: 1-15): When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive)
[32mcq[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):          Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control
[32maud[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use access unit delimiters
[32mbluray-compat[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Bluray compatibility workarounds
[32minit_qpP[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for P frame
[32minit_qpB[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for B frame
[32minit_qpI[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for I frame
[32mqp[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Constant quantization parameter rate control method
[32mweighted_pred[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Set 1 to enable weighted prediction
[32mcoder[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-2): Coder type
	 * [33mdefault[0m: 
	 * [33mauto[0m: 
	 * [33mcabac[0m: 
	 * [33mcavlc[0m: 
	 * [33mac[0m: 
	 * [33mvlc[0m:

Configuration: --prefix=/usr --extra-version=0ubuntu0.2 --toolchain=hardened --libdir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu --incdir=/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu --enable-gpl --disable-stripping --enable-avresample --enable-avisynth --enable-gnutls --enable-ladspa --enable-libass --enable-libbluray --enable-libbs2b --enable-libcaca --enable-libcdio --enable-libflite --enable-libfontconfig --enable-libfreetype --enable-libfribidi --enable-libgme --enable-libgsm --enable-libmp3lame --enable-libmysofa --enable-libopenjpeg --enable-libopenmpt --enable-libopus --enable-libpulse --enable-librubberband --enable-librsvg --enable-libshine --enable-libsnappy --enable-libsoxr --enable-libspeex --enable-libssh --enable-libtheora --enable-libtwolame --enable-libvorbis --enable-libvpx --enable-libwavpack --enable-libwebp --enable-libx265 --enable-libxml2 --enable-libxvid --enable-libzmq --enable-libzvbi --enable-omx --enable-openal --enable-opengl --enable-sdl2 --enable-libdc1394 --enable-libdrm --enable-libiec61883 --enable-chromaprint --enable-frei0r --enable-libopencv --enable-libx264 --enable-shared

[32mOptions (basic):[0m

[32mpreset[0m (sint, default: [3m2[0m, minmax: 0-11): Set the encoding preset
	 * [33mdefault[0m: 
	 * [33mslow[0m: hq 2 passes
	 * [33mmedium[0m: hq 1 pass
	 * [33mfast[0m: hp 1 pass
	 * [33mhp[0m: 
	 * [33mhq[0m: 
	 * [33mbd[0m: 
	 * [33mll[0m: low latency
	 * [33mllhq[0m: low latency hq
	 * [33mllhp[0m: low latency hp
	 * [33mlossless[0m: lossless
	 * [33mlosslesshp[0m: lossless hp
[32mprofile[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-4): Set the encoding profile
	 * [33mmain[0m: 
	 * [33mmain10[0m: 
	 * [33mrext[0m: 
[32mlevel[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-186): Set the encoding level restriction
	 * [33mauto[0m: 
	 * [33m1[0m: 
	 * [33m1.0[0m: 
	 * [33m2[0m: 
	 * [33m2.0[0m: 
	 * [33m2.1[0m: 
	 * [33m3[0m: 
	 * [33m3.0[0m: 
	 * [33m3.1[0m: 
	 * [33m4[0m: 
	 * [33m4.0[0m: 
	 * [33m4.1[0m: 
	 * [33m5[0m: 
	 * [33m5.0[0m: 
	 * [33m5.1[0m: 
	 * [33m5.2[0m: 
	 * [33m6[0m: 
	 * [33m6.0[0m: 
	 * [33m6.1[0m: 
	 * [33m6.2[0m: 
[32mtier[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Set the encoding tier
	 * [33mmain[0m: 
	 * [33mhigh[0m: 
[32mrc[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-I): Override the preset rate-control
	 * [33mconstqp[0m: Constant QP mode
	 * [33mvbr[0m: Variable bitrate mode
	 * [33mcbr[0m: Constant bitrate mode
	 * [33mvbr_minqp[0m: Variable bitrate mode with MinQP (deprecated)
	 * [33mll_2pass_quality[0m: Multi-pass optimized for image quality (deprecated)
	 * [33mll_2pass_size[0m: Multi-pass optimized for constant frame size (deprecated)
	 * [33mvbr_2pass[0m: Multi-pass variable bitrate mode (deprecated)
	 * [33mcbr_ld_hq[0m: Constant bitrate low delay high quality mode
	 * [33mcbr_hq[0m: Constant bitrate high quality mode
	 * [33mvbr_hq[0m: Variable bitrate high quality mode
[32mrc-lookahead[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-I): Number of frames to look ahead for rate-control
[32msurfaces[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-64): Number of concurrent surfaces
[32mcbr[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use cbr encoding mode
[32m2pass[0m (bool, default: [3mtrue[0m):   Use 2pass encoding mode
[32mgpu[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -2-I): Selects which NVENC capable GPU to use. First GPU is 0, second is 1, and so on.
	 * [33many[0m: Pick the first device available
	 * [33mlist[0m: List the available devices
[32mdelay[0m (sint, default: [3m+I[0m, minmax: 0-I): Delay frame output by the given amount of frames
[32mno-scenecut[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts
[32mforced-idr[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.
[32mspatial_aq[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): set to 1 to enable Spatial AQ
[32mtemporal_aq[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): set to 1 to enable Temporal AQ
[32mzerolatency[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set 1 to indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay)
[32mnonref_p[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set this to 1 to enable automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames
[32mstrict_gop[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Set 1 to minimize GOP-to-GOP rate fluctuations
[32maq-strength[0m (sint, default: [3m8[0m, minmax: 1-15): When Spatial AQ is enabled, this field is used to specify AQ strength. AQ strength scale is from 1 (low) - 15 (aggressive)
[32mcq[0m (flt, default: [3m0[0m):          Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic) for constant quality mode in VBR rate control
[32maud[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m):    Use access unit delimiters
[32mbluray-compat[0m (bool, default: [3mfalse[0m): Bluray compatibility workarounds
[32minit_qpP[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for P frame
[32minit_qpB[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for B frame
[32minit_qpI[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Initial QP value for I frame
[32mqp[0m (sint, default: [3m-1[0m, minmax: -1-51): Constant quantization parameter rate control method
[32mweighted_pred[0m (sint, default: [3m0[0m, minmax: 0-1): Set 1 to enable weighted prediction
